Appetizer.title: Spicy Garlic Tofu
Appetizer.discription: Spicy garlic tofu is a flavorful and protein-packed dish that will satisfy your taste buds. This tofu is infused with spicy and garlicky flavors, making it a delicious addition to stir-fries, rice bowls, salads, or simply enjoyed on its own.
directions: Start by pressing the tofu to remove excess water. Wrap the tofu block in a clean kitchen towel or paper towels, then place something heavy on top (like a cutting board or a heavy pan). Let it sit for about 15 minutes to press out the water.
In a bowl, combine the cornstarch, soy sauce, chili garlic sauce, sesame oil, and minced garlic to make the marinade.
Cut the pressed tofu into cubes and add them to the marinade. Gently toss the tofu cubes until they are well coated in the spicy garlic marinade. Let the tofu marinate for about 10 minutes.
In a large skillet or non-stick pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the marinated tofu cubes to the hot pan, making sure not to overcrowd them. Cook the tofu for about 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they become golden brown and crispy.
Once the tofu is cooked to your desired crispiness, remove it from the pan and place it on a plate lined with paper towels to absorb any excess oil.
Garnish the spicy garlic tofu with chopped green onions and toasted sesame seeds for extra flavor and presentation.
Serve the spicy garlic tofu as a delicious and protein-rich main dish or as a tasty addition to your favorite stir-fries, rice bowls, or salads.
Enjoy the bold and spicy flavors of this tofu dish that's sure to be a hit with tofu lovers and non-tofu lovers alike!

Appetizer.title: Buffalo Style Tofu Strips
Appetizer.discription: Buffalo-style tofu strips are a delicious and spicy vegan twist on classic buffalo wings. These crispy tofu strips are coated in a tangy buffalo sauce, perfect for serving as a party appetizer or a flavorful main dish.
directions: Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it.
In a shallow bowl, mix the all-purpose flour, cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper to create the coating mixture.
Dredge each tofu strip in the coating mixture, pressing gently to adhere the mixture to the tofu. Shake off any excess flour mixture.
Place the coated tofu strips on the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake the tofu strips in the preheated oven for about 20 minutes, flipping them halfway through, until they are crispy and golden brown.
While the tofu is baking, heat the buffalo sauce in a saucepan over low heat.
Once the tofu strips are done baking, remove them from the oven and transfer them to a mixing bowl.
Pour the heated buffalo sauce over the tofu strips and toss them gently to coat each strip evenly with the spicy sauce.
Return the sauced tofu strips to the baking sheet and bake for an additional 5 minutes to let the sauce soak in and get slightly sticky.
Remove the buffalo-style tofu strips from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Garnish the tofu strips with chopped green onions for added freshness and flavor.
Serve the buffalo-style tofu strips with celery sticks and, if desired, vegan ranch or blue cheese dressing for dipping.
Enjoy these tasty and spicy buffalo-style tofu strips as a delicious appetizer or a satisfying main dish!

ingredients.ingredient: Firm tofu, drained and cut into strips
Vegan ranch or blue cheese dressing (for dipping, optional)

Appetizer.title: Vegan Red Pesto
Appetizer.discription: Vegan red pesto is a delightful and versatile sauce made without cheese or any animal products. This flavorful pesto features sun-dried tomatoes, basil, garlic, and nuts, making it a perfect accompaniment to pasta, sandwiches, or as a dip for vegetables.
directions: In a food processor, combine the sun-dried tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, toasted pine nuts or walnuts, and peeled garlic cloves.
Pulse the ingredients until they are finely chopped and well combined.
Add the nutritional yeast, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt, and black pepper to the food processor.
Process the mixture until it forms a smooth and creamy pesto sauce.
Taste the vegan red pesto and adjust the seasoning, adding more salt or lemon juice if desired.
Transfer the pesto sauce to a jar or airtight container for storage.
You can use the vegan red pesto immediately or refrigerate it for later use.
Enjoy the delicious and dairy-free vegan red pesto as a pasta sauce, a spread for sandwiches, a dip for vegetables, or a flavorful addition to various dishes!

Appetizer.title: Baked Tortilla Chips
Appetizer.discription: Baked tortilla chips are a healthier and homemade alternative to store-bought chips. These crispy chips are easy to make and perfect for snacking or serving with your favorite dips and salsas.
directions: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Stack the corn tortillas together and cut them into wedges, just like you would cut a pizza.
In a large bowl, drizzle the olive oil over the tortilla wedges.
Add the salt, ground cumin, chili powder, and garlic powder to the bowl.
Gently toss the tortilla wedges until they are evenly coated with the oil and spices.
Arrange the seasoned tortilla wedges in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake the tortilla chips in the preheated oven for about 12-15 minutes or until they become crispy and lightly golden.
Keep an eye on the chips while baking to avoid burning them.
Once the chips are done baking, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Serve the baked tortilla chips with your favorite dips, salsa, or guacamole.
Enjoy these delicious and guilt-free tortilla chips as a tasty snack or a party appetizer!

Appetizer.title: Chipotle Refried Beans
Appetizer.discription: Chipotle refried beans are a smoky and flavorful twist on the classic refried beans. These beans are cooked with chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, giving them a delicious spicy kick and a hint of smokiness. They are a perfect side dish or filling for burritos, tacos, and enchiladas.
directions: In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add the finely chopped onion and minced garlic to the pan. Sauté for about 2-3 minutes or until the onions become translucent and fragrant.
Add the ground cumin and ground coriander to the pan. Stir and cook for an additional minute to toast the spices.
Add the cooked pinto beans to the pan, along with the chipotle peppers in adobo sauce. Use a spoon to mash some of the beans while leaving some whole for texture.
Pour in the vegetable broth or water to the pan to help create a creamy consistency. Stir the beans and let them cook for about 5-7 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
Season the chipotle refried beans with salt and black pepper to taste.
Squeeze fresh lime juice over the beans and give them a final stir.
Remove the pan from the heat, and garnish the chipotle refried beans with chopped fresh cilantro.
Serve the flavorful chipotle refried beans as a delicious side dish or use them as a filling for burritos, tacos, or enchiladas.
Enjoy the smoky and spicy goodness of these chipotle-infused refried beans!

Appetizer.title: Oven Roasted Sweet Potato & Tofu Veggie Skewers
Appetizer.discription: Oven-roasted sweet potato & tofu veggie skewers are a delicious and healthy option for a flavorful vegetarian meal. These skewers are packed with colorful vegetables, sweet potatoes, and marinated tofu, all roasted to perfection in the oven.
directions: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, combine the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, maple syrup, dried thyme, salt, and black pepper to create the marinade.
Add the cubed sweet potatoes, tofu, bell peppers, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and sliced zucchini to the marinade. Gently toss everything until well coated.
Thread the marinated sweet potatoes, tofu, and vegetables onto the soaked wooden skewers, alternating the ingredients for colorful skewers.
Place the skewers on the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
Brush any remaining marinade over the skewers for extra flavor.
Roast the sweet potato & tofu veggie skewers in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are tender and slightly caramelized.
Flip the skewers halfway through the roasting process to ensure even cooking.
Once the skewers are cooked to perfection, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Serve the oven-roasted sweet potato & tofu veggie skewers as a delightful and wholesome vegetarian meal.
Enjoy the burst of flavors and textures in these colorful skewers, perfect for a family dinner or a gathering with friends!

ingredients.ingredient: Bell peppers (assorted colors), cut into chunks

Appetizer.title: Sweet & Spicy Miso Roasted Sweet Potatoes with Sambal Tahini Mayo
Appetizer.discription: Sweet & spicy miso roasted sweet potatoes with sambal tahini mayo is a mouthwatering dish that combines the sweetness of roasted sweet potatoes with the umami flavor of miso and the heat of sambal tahini mayo. It's a perfect blend of flavors and textures that will impress your taste buds.
directions: Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, whisk together the miso paste, maple syrup, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, garlic powder, sambal oelek, salt, and black pepper to create the marinade.
Add the cut sweet potatoes to the marinade and toss them until they are well coated.
Spread the miso-marinated sweet potatoes in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Roast the sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes or until they are tender and caramelized, flipping them once halfway through for even roasting.

While the sweet potatoes are roasting, prepare the sambal tahini mayo by combining the tahini, lime juice, and water in a bowl. Whisk until smooth and creamy. Add sambal oelek to the tahini mixture and stir until well combined. Adjust the spiciness to your taste.
Once the sweet potatoes are done roasting, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Serve the miso roasted sweet potatoes with a drizzle of the sambal tahini mayo.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro and sesame seeds for added flavor and presentation.
Enjoy this sweet and spicy fusion of flavors in the miso roasted sweet potatoes with sambal tahini mayo as a delicious side dish or a standout main course!

ingredients.ingredient: Sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks

Appetizer.title: Loaded Chili Sweet Potato Fries
Appetizer.discription: Loaded chili sweet potato fries are a scrumptious and indulgent treat that combines the sweetness of roasted sweet potato fries with savory and spicy chili toppings. These fries are then generously loaded with delicious toppings, making them a satisfying meal or a delightful appetizer for any occasion.
directions: Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato fries with olive oil, chili powder, garlic powder, paprika, ground cumin, salt, and black pepper until the fries are evenly coated with the seasoning.
Spread the seasoned sweet potato fries in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Roast the sweet potato fries in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes or until they are crispy and golden brown, flipping them once halfway through for even cooking.
While the fries are roasting, heat the canned chili in a saucepan over medium heat until it's warmed through.
Once the sweet potato fries are done roasting, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
To assemble the loaded chili sweet potato fries, place the roasted fries on a serving platter or individual plates.
Top the fries with the warm chili, shredded cheddar cheese, diced red onion, and chopped fresh cilantro.
Add dollops of sour cream on top for a creamy finish.
Serve the loaded chili sweet potato fries immediately as a delicious and hearty meal or a crowd-pleasing appetizer.
Enjoy the irresistible combination of sweet and spicy flavors in these loaded chili sweet potato fries!

ingredients.ingredient: Sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into fries

Appetizer.title: Seaweed Baked Fries with Hoisin Mayo & Sriracha Mayo
Appetizer.discription: Seaweed baked fries with hoisin mayo & sriracha mayo are a unique and flavorful twist on traditional fries. These fries are coated with crispy seaweed flakes and served with two delicious dipping sauces - hoisin mayo and sriracha mayo. It's a delightful combination of Asian-inspired flavors that will elevate your snacking experience.
directions: Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, toss the potato fries with olive oil, crushed seaweed flakes or nori, salt, and black pepper until the fries are well coated with the seaweed seasoning.
Spread the seaweed-coated fries in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake the seaweed fries in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until they are crispy and golden brown, flipping them once halfway through for even roasting.

While the fries are baking, prepare the dipping sauces. For the hoisin mayo, simply mix hoisin sauce with half of the mayonnaise in a bowl. For the sriracha mayo, mix sriracha sauce with the remaining mayonnaise in another bowl. Adjust the spiciness to your taste.
Once the seaweed fries are done baking, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Arrange the seaweed baked fries on a serving platter or individual plates.
Serve the fries with the hoisin mayo and sriracha mayo dipping sauces on the side.
Garnish the dipping sauces with chopped fresh chives for added flavor and presentation.
Enjoy the delightful combination of seaweed-coated fries with the savory hoisin mayo and the spicy kick of sriracha mayo!

ingredients.ingredient: Potatoes (russet or sweet potatoes), cut into fries
Seaweed flakes or nori sheets, crushed

Appetizer.title: Double Tomato Bruschetta with Balsamic Reduction
Appetizer.discription: Double tomato bruschetta with balsamic reduction is a vibrant and flavorful appetizer that celebrates the goodness of ripe tomatoes. This classic Italian dish features a delicious combination of fresh tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic reduction on crispy toasted bread slices.
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the diced ripe tomatoes, chopped sun-dried tomatoes, thinly sliced fresh basil leaves, minced garlic, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Gently toss all the ingredients until they are well combined. Let the mixture sit for about 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

While the tomato mixture is resting, toast the bread slices. You can do this by placing the slices on a baking sheet and broiling them in the oven for a few minutes on each side until they become lightly crispy.
Once the bread slices are toasted, you can rub them with a garlic clove for extra flavor.
To assemble the double tomato bruschetta, top each toasted bread slice with a generous spoonful of the tomato mixture.
Drizzle a little balsamic reduction over the bruschetta for added sweetness and tang.
Garnish the bruschetta with additional fresh basil leaves for presentation.
Serve the double tomato bruschetta immediately as a delightful and refreshing appetizer.
Enjoy the burst of flavors in this classic Italian bruschetta with the sweetness of ripe tomatoes and the tanginess of balsamic reduction!

ingredients.ingredient: Sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped

Appetizer.title: Fresh Salad Rolls with a Creamy Peanut Hoisin Sauce
Appetizer.discription: Fresh salad rolls with a creamy peanut hoisin sauce are a light and delicious appetizer or snack that is perfect for hot days. These rolls are filled with a colorful mix of fresh vegetables, herbs, and rice vermicelli noodles, and served with a creamy and flavorful peanut hoisin sauce for dipping.
directions: Prepare all the vegetables and herbs by washing and cutting them into thin, julienne strips.
Cook the rice vermicelli noodles according to the package instructions, then rinse them under cold water to cool and prevent sticking.
Fill a shallow dish or large plate with warm water. Dip one rice paper wrapper into the water for a few seconds until it softens. Place it on a clean and damp kitchen towel.
On the lower third of the rice paper wrapper, arrange a few lettuce leaves, a small handful of rice vermicelli noodles, and a variety of the julienned vegetables and herbs.
If using shrimp, add a couple of shrimp on top of the vegetable mixture.
Fold the sides of the rice paper over the filling, then fold the bottom of the wrapper over the filling and roll it tightly to form a neat and tight roll.
Repeat the process with the remaining rice paper wrappers and filling ingredients.
To make the creamy peanut hoisin sauce, refer to the separate recipe for the sauce.
Serve the fresh salad rolls with the creamy peanut hoisin sauce for dipping.
Enjoy these refreshing and flavorful salad rolls as a light and healthy appetizer or snack!

ingredients.ingredient: Rice vermicelli noodles, cooked and cooled
Lettuce leaves (butter lettuce or leaf lettuce)

Appetizer.title: Vibrant Roasted Beetroot Hummus
Appetizer.discription: Vibrant roasted beetroot hummus is a visually stunning and delicious twist on classic hummus. The addition of roasted beetroots gives this hummus a beautiful pink color and a slightly sweet and earthy flavor that pairs perfectly with the creaminess of the chickpeas and tahini.
directions: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place the peeled and cut beetroot chunks on the prepared baking sheet and drizzle them with a little olive oil. Toss to coat the beetroots evenly with the oil.
Roast the beetroots in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes or until they are tender when pierced with a fork. Let them cool slightly before using.
In a food processor, combine the roasted beetroots, cooked chickpeas, tahini, minced garlic, lemon juice, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, and black pepper.
Pulse the ingredients until they start to come together.
While the food processor is running, slowly drizzle in the extra virgin olive oil and water, and continue to blend until the hummus reaches a smooth and creamy consistency.
Taste the roasted beetroot hummus and adjust the seasonings to your liking, adding more salt, lemon juice, or spices if desired.
Transfer the vibrant roasted beetroot hummus to a serving bowl.
Garnish the hummus with chopped fresh parsley and toasted sesame seeds for added flavor and presentation.
Serve the hummus with pita bread, vegetable sticks, or crackers for a colorful and delicious appetizer or snack.
Enjoy the delightful combination of flavors and the beautiful color in this vibrant roasted beetroot hummus!

ingredients.ingredient: Beetroots, peeled and cut into chunks

Appetizer.title: Zucchini Rolls with Vegan Ricotta Cheese
Appetizer.discription: Zucchini rolls with vegan ricotta cheese are a delectable and healthy appetizer or light meal option. Thinly sliced zucchini is filled with a creamy and dairy-free ricotta cheese mixture, creating a flavorful and satisfying dish that is perfect for vegans and anyone looking for a delightful twist on traditional rolls.
directions: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
Using a mandoline slicer or a sharp knife, thinly slice the zucchini lengthwise into long strips.
In a bowl, combine the zucchini slices with extra virgin olive oil, salt, and black pepper. Toss gently to coat the zucchini evenly.
Place the zucchini slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, making sure they don't overlap.
Roast the zucchini slices in the preheated oven for about 5-7 minutes or until they become slightly softened. Be careful not to overcook them, as they will be rolled later.

While the zucchini slices are roasting, prepare the vegan ricotta cheese filling. In a bowl, mix the vegan ricotta cheese, chopped fresh basil, chopped fresh parsley, lemon zest, and garlic powder until well combined.
Remove the zucchini slices from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Spread a thin layer of the vegan ricotta cheese mixture onto each zucchini slice.
Place a few halved cherry tomatoes at one end of each zucchini slice.
Carefully roll up each zucchini slice to form a beautiful zucchini roll.
Arrange the zucchini rolls on a serving platter and drizzle them with balsamic glaze for added sweetness and tang.
Serve the zucchini rolls with vegan ricotta cheese as an elegant and flavorful appetizer or a light and satisfying meal.
Enjoy these delicious and nutritious zucchini rolls as a delightful vegan treat!

Appetizer.title: Balsamic & Basil Bruschetta
Appetizer.discription: Balsamic & basil bruschetta is a classic and refreshing Italian appetizer that celebrates the flavors of ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, and tangy balsamic vinegar. This simple yet delightful dish is perfect for entertaining guests or as a light and flavorful snack.
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the diced ripe tomatoes, chopped fresh basil, minced garlic, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Gently toss all the ingredients until they are well combined. Let the mixture sit for about 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

While the tomato mixture is resting, toast the bread slices. You can do this by placing the slices on a baking sheet and broiling them in the oven for a few minutes on each side until they become lightly crispy.
Once the bread slices are toasted, you can rub them with a garlic clove for extra flavor.
To assemble the balsamic & basil bruschetta, top each toasted bread slice with a generous spoonful of the tomato mixture.
Drizzle a little balsamic vinegar over the bruschetta for added sweetness and tang.
Serve the balsamic & basil bruschetta immediately as a delightful and refreshing appetizer or snack.
Enjoy the burst of flavors in this classic Italian bruschetta with the sweetness of ripe tomatoes, the aroma of fresh basil, and the tanginess of balsamic vinegar!

Appetizer.title: Sun-Dried Tomato & White Bean Dip
Appetizer.discription: Sun-dried tomato & white bean dip is a creamy and flavorful dip that is perfect for parties, gatherings, or as a tasty snack. The combination of sun-dried tomatoes and white beans creates a rich and savory dip that pairs well with crackers, vegetable sticks, or pita bread.
directions: In a food processor, combine the white beans, sun-dried tomatoes, minced garlic, fresh lemon juice, tahini, extra virgin olive oil, water, ground cumin, salt, and black pepper.
Blend the ingredients until the mixture becomes smooth and creamy. If needed, you can add more water or olive oil to achieve your desired consistency.
Taste the sun-dried tomato & white bean dip and adjust the seasonings to your liking. You can add more lemon juice, salt, or red pepper flakes for added spice if desired.
Transfer the dip to a serving bowl.
Garnish the dip with chopped fresh parsley for added flavor and presentation.
Serve the sun-dried tomato & white bean dip with crackers, vegetable sticks, or pita bread.
Enjoy this delicious and nutritious dip as a crowd-pleasing appetizer or a satisfying snack!

ingredients.ingredient: White beans (cannellini beans), drained and rinsed
Red pepper flakes (optional, for added spice)

Appetizer.title: Strawberry Mango Salsa with Baked Pita Chips
Appetizer.discription: Strawberry mango salsa with baked pita chips is a vibrant and refreshing appetizer that combines the sweetness of ripe strawberries and mangoes with the zing of lime and the kick of jalapeño. This colorful and flavorful salsa is served with crispy baked pita chips for a delightful and healthy snack.
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the diced strawberries, diced mangoes, finely chopped red onion, chopped fresh cilantro, and finely chopped jalapeño pepper.
In a separate small bowl, whisk together the lime juice and honey (or agave syrup) until well combined.
Pour the lime-honey mixture over the strawberry mango mixture.
Season the salsa with salt and black pepper, then gently toss all the ingredients together until well combined.
Let the strawberry mango salsa sit for about 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
While the salsa is resting, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
Arrange the pita triangles on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Brush both sides of the pita triangles with olive oil.
Bake the pita triangles in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes or until they become crispy and lightly golden brown.
Once the pita chips are ready, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Serve the strawberry mango salsa in a bowl alongside the crispy baked pita chips.
Enjoy this delightful and colorful salsa with the baked pita chips for a refreshing and tasty snack!

ingredients.ingredient: Jalapeño pepper, seeds removed and finely chopped

Appetizer.title: Roasted Lemon Turmeric Hummus
Appetizer.discription: Roasted lemon turmeric hummus is a zesty and flavorful twist on traditional hummus. Roasting the lemon gives it a slightly caramelized and mellow flavor, while the addition of turmeric brings a warm and earthy taste. This creamy and vibrant hummus is perfect as a dip, spread, or a tasty accompaniment to your favorite dishes.
directions: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cut the lemon in half, and place it on a baking sheet cut side down.
Roast the lemon in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until it becomes slightly caramelized and softened.
Once the lemon is roasted, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly.
In a food processor, combine the cooked chickpeas, tahini, roasted lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, ground turmeric, salt, and black pepper.
Blend the ingredients until the mixture becomes smooth and creamy.
While the food processor is running, slowly drizzle in the water to achieve your desired consistency.
Taste the roasted lemon turmeric hummus and adjust the seasonings to your liking, adding more salt or turmeric if desired.
Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl.
Drizzle a little olive oil over the hummus and sprinkle some paprika for added color and flavor.
Serve the roasted lemon turmeric hummus as a delicious dip, spread, or accompaniment to your favorite dishes.
Enjoy the delightful combination of flavors in this creamy and vibrant hummus!

Appetizer.title: Chunky Avocado Mango Salsa
Appetizer.discription: Chunky avocado mango salsa is a fresh and colorful salsa that brings together the creaminess of avocado and the sweetness of ripe mangoes with a burst of tangy lime and a kick of jalapeño. This delightful salsa is perfect for dipping, topping grilled meats or fish, or adding a burst of flavor to tacos and salads.
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the diced mango, diced avocados, diced red bell pepper, finely chopped red onion, finely chopped jalapeño pepper, and chopped fresh cilantro.
Drizzle the fresh lime juice over the salsa.
Season the salsa with salt and black pepper.
Gently toss all the ingredients together until well combined, being careful not to mash the avocado too much to keep a chunky texture.
Let the chunky avocado mango salsa sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve the salsa in a bowl alongside tortilla chips, grilled meats or fish, or use it as a topping for tacos and salads.
Enjoy this vibrant and flavorful chunky avocado mango salsa as a delicious and refreshing addition to your meals!

ingredients.ingredient: Jalapeño pepper, seeds removed and finely chopped
